skills.skill: Cloud Data Engineering (Google Cloud, Big Query)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and lead activities in artificial intelligence, data engineering, operations automation, security remediation, and Omni channel technology.
Analyze marketing, customer experience, and digital operations environments to build data pipelines and transform data into actionable intelligence.
Design, build, and document new data pipelines, analytics, and fact tables for reports.
Collaborate in cross-functional teams to source new data, develop schema requirements, and maintain metadata.
Identify ways to improve data reliability, efficiency, and quality using large data sets to address business issues.
Use data to discover tasks that can be automated and analyze existing Teradata/SQL queries for performance improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience. Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems and / or related technical discipline preferred. Teradata/Big Data Analytics Certification desirable.
